thread.title: Ideal for Westminster activities
thread.title_full: Ideal for Westminster activities - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AprilMFlorida2014
title: Ideal for Westminster activities
text: This hotel was selected as we were attending the Westminster Central hall for a venue. It was a nice walk along the river side to the venue and easy to get to. The hotel was just off the main strip. I would recommend if you are a visitor from abroad, you should select a high floor room for a view of the city. The breakfast was great , only downfall was no Weetabix for my Daughter but not a problem as we had them with us. Overall nice hotel in great location for Westminster activities.
